text: Ila Yehoashi, mndewa wa Isilaeli, nakamwidichila Amasiya, mndewa wa Yuda, yolonga, “Zuwa limwe izuchila lya mbigili lya Lebanoni nalilajiza usenga kwa igodi lya mwelezi liwele ako Lebanoni, ‘Mlavye mhinza wa hegwe yaholeche na msongolo wa heni.’ Hamba igongolo lya kisolo lya Lebanoni nalyuya na kulibiga lila izuchila lya mbigili.
